## This grid is constructed to give on average 4 digits of precision in a
## variety of molecular integrals, using the Becke scheme with k=3.

## The grids were created by Toon Verstraelen in January 2012 as initial attempt
## to generate tuned grids based on a series of benchmarks.


# Cost threshold for grid selection:   -4.00000

# Grid for Z=1
# Cost:             -4.72032
# Number of points: 1896
# Number of shells: 40

1
   ExpRTransform 0.0018424383388732709 74.00448326759525 40
   6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 14 14 14 26 38 50 110 110 146 110 110 110 110 110 110 110 110 110 110 110 50 6 6 6
